DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy combination Methenamine + Methylthioninium chloride compare phenazopyridine ( comparator product ) symptomatic relief dysuria .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Methenamine + Methylthioninium Chloride v Phenazopyridine Symptomatic Control Dysuria
DOC.detailed_description: - Single blind , randomize , prospective study . - Length experience : 03 day 07 day . - 03 visit ( day 1 , 4 7 ) . - Evaluation efficacy safety medication . - Shall assessed adverse event .
DOC.criteria: Patients agree participate agree term propose Clinical trial ; Patients age 18 year ethnicity ; Presence dysuria mark great equal 5 measure point categorical scale pretreatment pain symptom ; Patients febrile ( axillary T º : ≥ 38 ° C ) , back pain lumbar ; Patients complicate clinical presentation urinary tract infection ; Patients history allergy intolerance know suspect one ingredient product investigation ; Patients pregnant lactation , childbearing potential making use effective contraception ; Patients present renal disease severe liver disease , accord medical history / laboratory ; Patients present severe systemic disease accord know medical history ; Patients receive antibiotic treatment , anthelmintic within 7 day prior study entry ; Patients unable understand guideline specify protocol attend study visit unable complete log ; Pregnancy risk pregnancy lactate patient ; Any find clinical observation ( history physical examination ) interpret physician investigator risk patient 's participation study .
